@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“Goodoo dolls, post:6, topic:184280”]jesus veng. your flaming every one why dont you help out some one instead of being an old grumpy bastard.

Devil sorry for the spam but i wish i knew this too im trying to get this on my server i dont know about this but i think its easier to code this formula in project 17[/quote]

The fact that he’s asking me, instead of looking for a way to do it himself tells me that he doesn’t deserve help.

Tip: search for anything related to combat, you’ll probably find something useful.
